SELECT P.post_id , P.member_id , P.category , P.title , P.content , P.thumbnail , P.created_at , P.updated_at , P.status , ( SELECT COUNT(TRUE) FROM comment AS C WHERE C.post_id = P.post_id ) AS comment_count , ( SELECT COUNT(TRUE) FROM post_feeling AS PF WHERE PF.post_id = P.post_id ) AS feeling_count FROM post AS P INNER JOIN member AS M ON P.member_id = M.member_id WHERE TRUE
HAVING feeling_count >= 10
ORDER BY feeling_count DESC
ORDER BY P.created_at DESC
LIMIT ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
